extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by the vulnerability by verifying the installed version of MOVEit Transfer.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?

extracted_playbook.title: Deny HTTP and HTTPS Traffic
extracted_playbook.description: Before applying patches, deny HTTP (TCP/80) and HTTPS (TCP/443) traffic to the MOVEit environment to prevent unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade MOVEit Transfer
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade MOVEit Transfer to the recommended versions: 2023.0.1, 2022.1.5, 2022.0.4, 2021.1.4, or 2021.0.6 to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Activate HTTP and HTTPS Traffic
extracted_playbook.description: After applying the patches, activate HTTP (TCP/80) and HTTPS (TCP/443) traffic to the MOVEit environment.

extracted_playbook.title: Clean Unauthorized Files and User Accounts
extracted_playbook.description: Remove any potential unauthorized files or user accounts from the system to ensure security.
